trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetComInterfaceForObject(System.Object,System.Type,System.Runtime.InteropServices.CustomQueryInterfaceMode)" /> method's [IUnknown::QueryInterface](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=144867) calls can use the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ICustomQueryInterface" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: Indica se as chamadas de [IUnknown::QueryInterface](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=144867) do método <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetComInterfaceForObject(System.Object,System.Type,System.Runtime.InteropServices.CustomQueryInterfaceMode)" /> podem usar a interface <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ICustomQueryInterface" />.

trans-unit.source: [IUnknown::QueryInterface](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=144867) method calls can use the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ICustomQueryInterface" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: As chamadas do método [IUnknown::QueryInterface](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=144867) podem usar a interface <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ICustomQueryInterface" />.

trans-unit.source: When you use this value, the <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetComInterfaceForObject(System.Object,System.Type,System.Runtime.InteropServices.CustomQueryInterfaceMode)" /> method overload functions like the <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetComInterfaceForObject(System.Object,System.Type)" /> overload.
trans-unit.target: Quando você usa esse valor, a sobrecarga do método <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetComInterfaceForObject(System.Object,System.Type,System.Runtime.InteropServices.CustomQueryInterfaceMode)" /> funciona como a sobrecarga <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetComInterfaceForObject(System.Object,System.Type)" />.

trans-unit.source: [IUnknown::QueryInterface](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=144867) method calls should ignore the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ICustomQueryInterface" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: As chamadas do método [IUnknown::QueryInterface](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=144867) devem ignorar a interface <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ICustomQueryInterface" />.
